iterations.failure_reason: Rule hit but no new signatures
improvement_suggestions: Instead of relying on exact instruction sequences, the rule should focus on identifying the broader functionality being performed (calling `ExitProcess` through an indirect call) and use more generic patterns and fewer skip offsets. We should also analyze the purpose of the indirect call to `ExitProcess` and potentially target that instead.

iterations.failure_reason: Rule hit but no new signatures
improvement_suggestions: Remove the `cape_options` meta tag from the YARA rule. The rule was intended to bypass, but the skip offset it introduced caused a crash. The bypass strategy was not effective and actively broke the execution.
